txt.en:
'I have spoken with my Dunlending allies, and they seem to have a belief that spreading ashes before the cairns of the dead will prevent the wights from escaping their tombs, though I have many doubts of the veracity of this claim.

'Nevertheless, I have promised that this task will be performed before I leave this place. Will you help me?

'Travel due east from camp, along the southern fork. There you will find the cairns before which you should spread these ashes. When you have done this, find Mair among the cairns.'
'The ashes you spread should prevent more of these abominations emerging from the cairns. Thank you, Duvodiad.'
'You may find an ally among the cairns.'
Naeglanc and his allies continue to battle the foul wights arising within the Bonevales.
Undisturbed cairns lie to the east of Echad Naeglanc, along the southern ridge.\n\nNaeglanc has asked you to scatter ashes before undisturbed cairns in the Bonevales.
Talk to Mair among the cairns
Seek out an ally among the cairns to the far eastern reaches of the Bonevales.\n\nYou should speak with Mair
